sourcesContent:
<template>
    <header>
        <v-theme-provider>
            <v-app-bar
            app
            >
                <v-app-bar-nav-icon></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

                <v-toolbar-title>{{title}}</v-toolbar-title>
                <v-btn icon>
                    <v-icon>mdi-plus</v-icon>
                </v-btn>
                
                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-switch
                    :value="darkMode" 
                    @change="toggleDarkMode" 
                    :label="`${switchLabel}`"
                    hide-details
                ></v-switch>
            </v-app-bar>
        </v-theme-provider>
    </header>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name:'Navbar',
    props:{
        title:String,
    },
    data: () => ({ 
      darkMode: false
    }),
    methods: {
      toggleDarkMode: function () {
        this.$vuetify.theme.dark = !this.$vuetify.theme.dark;
        this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      }
    },
    computed: {
      switchLabel: function () {
        return this.darkMode ? 'Light' : 'Dark';
      }
    }
}
</script>
